file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-07-04 - GALLEY CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GALLEY CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the galley curtain. B. The galley curtain is installed in the galley area of the passenger cabin, at zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-27-07-000-801-A GALLEY CURTAIN - REMOVAL ALL 25-27-07-400-801-A GALLEY CURTAIN - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-27-07 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GALLEY CURTAIN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the galley curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the galley curtain assembly as follows (Figure 401): (a) Release the tie back assembly (3) fastener button. (b) Release the carrier (1) fastener buttons. (c) Remove the galley curtain assembly (2). (2) If necessary, remove the track (1) (Figure 402). • Use a pin to release the track from the support. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-27-07 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Track - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A B ZONE 232 1 DET. A PIN (REF.) DET. B 145AMM250065.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-27-07 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GALLEY CURTAIN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the galley curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the galley curtain as follows (Figure 401): (a) Tighten the carrier (1) fastener buttons. (b) Put the galley curtain assembly (2) in the open position. (c) Hold the galley curtain assembly (2) with the tie back assembly (3). (d) Tighten the tie back assembly (3) fastener button. (2) If you removed the track (1), push it against the support to install it (Figure 402). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-27-07 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
